title: Lynda - Up and Running with Muse with James Fritz
description:
Up and Running with Muse

http://i.imgur.com/sIl02iA.jpg" rel="nofollow" target="_NEW">

1h 9m Beginner Jun 18, 2014

Meet Muse, the design-friendly tool that allows anyone familiar with programs like Photoshop or InDesign to create rich, HTML-based websitesÃ¢â‚¬â€even if you don't have a strong grasp on coding. James Fritz is your guide on this brief tour. He'll show you how to set up webpages, and add multimedia and interactive features like menus, slideshows, and maps. He'll also demonstrate how easy it is to export your site and publish it to the web. With all these skills in hand, you can go ahead and concentrate on the design; Muse will take care of the rest.
Topics include:
Creating a new site
Setting up master pages
Working with text and graphics
Adding hyperlinks and web forms
Embedding HTML and maps
Exporting and publishing a Muse website
